entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Buffalo Narrows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:44 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -27.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Buffalo Narrows Airport 12:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -27.2°C
Pressure: 104.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -30.2°C
Wind: S 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 25.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
